metadata.title: CVE-2018-10775 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: NULL pointer dereference in the _fields_add function in fields.c in libbibcore.a in bibutils through 6.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash), as demonstrated by end2xml.

criterions.comment: bibutils package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
